title: Max Bright Sunlight Vanity Mirror 1X/10X - MODEL: MAX110
description:
Boldly flexible. 

Why choose one magnification when you can have the best of both worlds? With the 10X/1X magnifications to choose from, doing your hair and make-up has never been easier. 

Zadro's Max Bright Sunlight Vanity Mirror features beautiful fluorescent lighting to ensure a clearer reflection of your true self. The unique flexible design allows for multiple viewing options whether you are standing or sitting. On one side, the 10X magnification is great for details and touch-ups, while the 1X magnification side provides an immaculate view of your entire face for everyday needs. 

Available in a White finish. 

•  Dual-Sided 10X and 1X Magnification with Optical Quality Glass
•  6 ft. Cord with Built-In Cord Storage in Base
•  Storage Tray at Base of Mirror
•  270° Swivel Mirror Head with Rotational Stop
•  Fluorescent Bulb that Emulates Natural Sunlight
•  ON/OFF Light Switch

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Experience the brightest reflection of yourself with Zadro's max bright sunlight vanity mirror. The ON/ OFF switch for the lighting is located in the front base of the mirror. With it's bold design, the max bright sunlight vanity mirror features a fully height and angle adjustable head and neck allowing for multiple viewing options. The mirror head rotates 270 degrees fro additional custom positioning. Zadro's max bright vanity mirrors feature surround light technology which provides even light dispersion at any angle. The included 22 watt florescent bold illuminates natural sun light and produces brightness equivalent to a 100 watt incandescent bulb. The seven inch dual sided mirror features optical quality glass and dual magnifications. On one side, the one time magnification provides and immaculate reflection of your entire face and is prefect for all around hair styling, cosmetics, and every beauty need in between. On the other side, the five time magnification is great for touch ups, detail, and make up application. The convenient storage tray helps keep your beauty and grooming supplies in order and close at hand. This pair comes with a six foot cord with built in storage in the base. A sleek white finish enhances This boldly designed vanity mirror.
